articles.title: Casino mogul Steve Wynn to pay $10M, cut gambling ties after Nevada sexual misconduct investigation - NBC News
articles.description: LAS VEGAS — Casino mogul Steve Wynn has ended a yearslong legal fight with Nevada gambling regulators that started with claims of workplace sexual misconduct, agreeing to pay a $10 million fine and cut ties to the industry he helped shape in Las Vegas.
